20110113015509.000|20110113015510.000|CC1|ANY CLOTH THERE, IT'S VERY HARD 
20110113015510.000|20110113015512.000|CC1|TO GET IT OUT UNLESS THERE'S    
20110113015512.000|20110113015514.000|CC1|SOME KIND OF DETERGENT, SO      
20110113015514.000|20110113015515.000|CC1|THEY'LL BE LOOKING FOR ANY      
20110113015515.000|20110113015516.000|CC1|SOURCE OF DNA THAT THEY CAN GET.
20110113015516.000|20110113015518.000|CC1|THEY'VE GOTTEN DNA FROM OTHER   
20110113015518.000|20110113015518.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110113015518.000|20110113015518.000|CC1|WHY?                            
20110113015518.000|20110113015520.000|CC1|WHO KNOWS, THAT DNA MAY NOT BE  
20110113015520.000|20110113015521.000|CC1|AVAILABLE AT SOME POINT DOWN THE
20110113015521.000|20110113015522.000|CC1|ROAD AND THEY WANT TO USE ALL   
20110113015522.000|20110113015524.000|CC1|THE PIECES OF THE PUZZLE.       
20110113015524.000|20110113015527.000|CC1|>> AND, DR. McCARY, HOW WOULD   
20110113015527.000|20110113015529.000|CC1|ANTI-ANXIETY MEDICATION AFFECT
